description: i just read about. i will tell when it be tested!!
I discovered this accidentally. Tried it, it works good. Asked some basic questions about php, laravel, ruby, rails. It gave correct answers. It will definitely save time of searching for syntax.
I couldn't find out how to use it. I see that effort was put in. Sorry!

Am I a hack programmer? Absolutely.

Installed the app - opened the default Ubuntu terminal app and tested. Looks like a handy app. Some example operations:

$ howdoi set colors in shell
Black    			0;30   Dark Gray   	1;30
Red     			0;31   Light Red   	1;31
Green    			0;32   Light Green  	1;32
Brown/Orange 	0;33   Yellow    		1;33
Blue     			0;34   Light Blue  	1;34
Purple    			0;35   Light Purple 	1;35
Cyan     			0;36   Light Cyan  	1;36
Light Gray  		0;37   White     		1;37

$ howdoi play dunnet
/Application/Emacs.app/Contents/MacOS/Emacs -batch -l dunnet

$ howdoi query postgresql
psql -U username mydatabase 
mydatabase=#

It appears that the answers given are limited in scope and highly directive. I will still need to hack my way through Google and StackOverflow to get context around how to solve problems. This might be useful for quick and concise answers. 

Nice work!
summary: Neat App - Will Be Useful - Assumes Prior Command Line Skills

description: Good for things like, how do i iterate over an object in python, or something simple like that. Also I tried looking for some easter eggs but as of yet all I've found is if I ask it very abstract things it shows me how to close the calculator. Maybe thats a dev inside joke?

Odd, it seems to work for some people. No matter what I ask it, it always says "Sorry, couldn't find any help with that topic".
Sorry about this.

For those who complain about it not working, it's because this package is outdated and broken (as of 2021-07-10), it reports to be version 1.1.9 but the latest version of howdoi is 2.0.16, go to the github repo to download the latest version: https://github.com/gleitz/howdoi

I installed it on ubuntu 20.04 and does not work:
howdoi -a change file attributes
Sorry, couldn't find any help with that topic

howdoi -a set colors in shell
Sorry, couldn't find any help with that topic

howdoi open text file
Sorry, couldn't find any help with that topic
I have installed this program into Ubuntu but I can not open it.
Very Poor Doc and use's examples. Ubuntu 20.04
summary: Very Poor Doc and use's examples

description: impressing ! It works surprisingly well, Thank you !
It stopped working when i ugraded to ubuntu 20.10. It keeps responding "Sorry, couldn't find any help with that topic" to any of my requests
